data.title: Talented actors, beautiful theatre, amazing shows!
data.text: One of my favorite things to do for date night or girls night out.  The youth show are exceptional as well.

data.title: Holy cow! These people are talented!
data.text: I have seen several plays, musicals, concerts and other events at Theatre Workshop over the years. They are absolutely the most talented non-profit theatre around. You can expect quality performances, a fully renovated Empress theatre, and lots of friendly faces!

data.title: Best Theatre Experience in Town!
data.text: We just saw an amazing performance of Pride and Prejudice here recently and the Empress Theatre building on Frederica St is being renovated and the work that's been completed is already wonderful! Great smaller shows at their 5th St theatre, the Trinity Center (housed inside an repurposed 19th century church) is a wonderful and intimate playhouse for smaller shows or dinner theatre. The Empress is a converted movie theater and Goldie's variety show venue that was incredibly popular in it's heyday. I cannot recommend the experience enough for someone looking for a unique night out with a talented group of community players.
